title: The Guerrilla Guide To Being A Theatrical Producer
description: “The Guerrilla Guide to Being a Theatrical Producer” by Teddy Hayes is a down to earth, step by step guide on how to start with an idea and little or no money to create your own commercial theatrical production. It also includes special sections on writing and music. Penned by an award-winning veteran practitioner with 45 years’ experience who has produced entertainment projects on 4 continents.
author: Teddy Hayes
